com.spartanlaboratories.engine.structure

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.structure.StructureObject
      • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.structure.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AI, Human

    public class Controller
extends StructureObject
    A class that controls units. Can be a human player or AI
    Author:
    spart_000

    • Field Detail

      • selectedUnit

        public Actor selectedUnit
        An Alive object that this controller currently has selected. This will be the target of unit-targeting abilities and other controller and hero behaviors.

      • controlledUnits

        protected java.util.ArrayList<Actor> controlledUnits

      • faction

        public Alive.Faction faction
        The faction to which this controller currently belongs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller(Engine engine,
                  Alive.Faction setFaction)

        The Controller Constructor

        Creates a new controller owned by the passed in engine and belonging to the passed in faction. Sets the selected unit to be the controller's hero.
        Parameters:
        engine - the game engine
        setFaction - the faction which this controller will belong to

        Draws this controller's hero
        Parameters:
        camera - that camera that is viewing this object

      • setRespawnTimer

        public void setRespawnTimer(int i)
        Starts a countdown timer that will cause the respawn of this controller's hero when it reaches 0.
        Parameters:
        i - the time that is remaining until the respawn of the hero in seconds
